title: Fears of wider war growing as Israeli troops exchange fire with Hezbollah in Lebanon
description: Fears of a wider war are growing, including in Lebanon, where Israeli troops exchanged fire with the Iranian-backed militant group Hezbollah. Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said if Hezbollah joins the war, he will order an attack on targets across Lebanon. NBC News’ Raf Sanchez reports.

title: Iranian teenager 'brain dead' weeks after subway incident, state media reports
description: A teenage girl who fell into a coma after an incident on the Tehran public transport is brain-dead, state media in Iran reported Sunday.
